The Penn State Lady Icers are used to being the underdog PERIOD

 junior forward Jess Waldron said PERIOD 

Outhustling its opponent will be key for Penn State  as it faces a team that has dominated the Lady Icers this season  No PERIOD  UMass  PERIOD The two teams will square off at  p.m PERIOD tomorrow at Brad Boss Ice Arena in Kingston R.I PERIOD

 Penn State junior forward MaryBeth DeYenno said PERIOD 

UMass has beaten Penn State three times in as many chances this season and has outscored the Lady Icers by a combined score of  PERIOD

Much of the damage has been done by Minutewomen Maura Grainger and Cara Murphy PERIOD Grainger who ranks third in the ACHA with  points has scored eight goals against the Lady Icers PERIOD Murphy is tied for seventh in the league with  points and lit the lamp five times against Penn State PERIOD

 Penn State coach Mo Stroemel said PERIOD 

Although several Penn State players have been stricken with the flu this week Stroemel isnt concerned about his teams health PERIOD

In fact he was pleased at how the team practiced Tuesday night saying the teams tempo was positive and mentioning the teams progress regarding its defensive schemes PERIOD

As they have for much of the season the Lady Icers will rely on their line of Waldron Chelsea Sacks and Alicia Lepore PERIOD Waldron is tenth in the ACHA with  points and Sacks also ranks in the top  with  points PERIOD Lepore who joined the team over winter break has eight points in six games PERIOD

 Lepore said about the importance of her line playing well PERIOD



If Penn State wants to pull off the upset it will also have to minimize the shots taken by the Minutewomen PERIOD In the three previous matchups the Lady Icers have been bombarded by an average of more than  shots per game PERIOD

 Stroemel said PERIOD 

The winner of the Penn StateUMass game will await the winner of the Rhode IslandUConn game which is scheduled for  p.m PERIOD tomorrow PERIOD The losers of each game will square off in the consolation game at  a.m PERIOD Sunday followed by the ECWHL Championship game at  p.m PERIOD
